articles.title: Aider Open-Source AI Pair Programming Tool Launches
articles.content: Aider launches as an open-source command-line AI pair programming tool, allowing developers to edit code in their local git repository using GPT-4.
articles.summary: Aider launches as an open-source command-line AI pair programming tool, allowing developers to edit code in their local git repository using GPT-4....
